text:
[Verse]
Lights are flashing
City calls my name
Feet are moving
This night's a game

[Chorus]
Lost in the night
Feel so alive
Stars take flight
We thrive

[Verse 2]
Neon glowing
Heartbeats in sync
Feel the rhythm
Don’t even think

[Chorus]
Lost in the night
Feel so alive
Stars take flight
We thrive

[Bridge]
Moon's our only guide
With every step we glide
Feel the world collide
Just trust the vibe

[Verse 3]
Music pounding
Mind is set free
Night is ours now
Come dance with me
title: Lost in the Night
